# ICollectedEvent.SetFieldValue method

Set a field value on standard properties or [`ExtractedFields`](ExtractedFields.md) if no standard properties are found for given name

```csharp
public void SetFieldValue(string propertyName, object value)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| propertyName | the name of the property to set value for |
| value | the value to set |
